BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing fines for the depositing of residential or commercial refuse into public litter baskets.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing fines for the depositing of residential or commercial refuse into public litter baskets.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the cleaning of liquid on a sidewalk, flagging or curbstone generated by trash placed curbside for collection and allowing the use of a hose to conduct such cleaning during times otherwise proscribed by such code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the cleaning of liquid on a sidewalk, flagging or curbstone generated by trash placed curbside for collection.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing penalties for littering
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to receptacles in a building or dwelling that has a high concentration of rodent infestation.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Receptacles in a building or dwelling that has a high concentration of rodent infestation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing fines for the depositing of residential or commercial refuse into public litter baskets.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
